description:
runtime: record full frame size for arm _sfloat2

With preemption, _sfloat2 can show up in stack traces.
Write the function prototype in a way that accurately
shows the frame size and the fact that it might contain
pointers.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=40f7cecb6daf ***

runtime: record full frame size for arm _sfloat2

With preemption, _sfloat2 can show up in stack traces.
Write the function prototype in a way that accurately
shows the frame size and the fact that it might contain
pointers.

R=golang-dev, dvyukov
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/11523043

subject: code review 11523043: runtime: record full frame size for arm _sfloat2
